p.d: : Gradually letting go Just to annoy her mother, Valérie agrees to talk about her burn-out on Stéphane's programme. But in the make-up room, she wonders if public exposure would be a good thing. Madeleine and Kevin find the lease signed by Valérie, which she's told no one about... Directed by: Stéphane Lapointe (season 1, Canada, 2016) Screenplay: Isabelle Langlois Cast: Sophie Cadieux (Valérie), Antoine Archambault (Thomas), Sylvie Léonard (Madeleine), Simon Lacroix (Éric), Éric Paulhus (Kevin), Éric Bernier (Stéphane), Jean-MoIse Martin (Simon), Olivia Palacci (Genevieve), Christine Beaulieu (Josiane) Genre: comedy drama
